The app listen and analyze the sound in real time from the built-in mic, headset, guitar clip on or from any other external microphone. It is so accurate that it will be your best friend for guitar intonation!

My mission is to create the most FUN and EASY dj mixer, so even my mother can be a DJ!

Therefore, YouDJ is NOT the most complete DJ app but offers the MUST-HAVE DJ TOOLS. You will see that all the tools are pretty high quality! It is still usable by advanced DJs but if you need more tools (MIDI controllers...), use a pro DJ app.

Included DJ tools : 2 virtual turntables, 16 sound effects such echo/flanger/crusher, sampler with 80 built-in samples, realistic vinyl scratching, auto beat synchronization, keylock, seamless loops, playlist automix, hotcues, 3 bands equalizer, crossfader, low/high pass filter, music visualization (party mode)...

To finish, you don't need to have music on your device, the app is preloaded with great music from talented artists I personally know. Please support the artists by following them on social medias. You can also play MP3 files stored on your device.

YouDJ is available on all desktop and mobile platforms. You should definitely try at least the computer version too (you.dj).

Hoping you will love the app and be prepared to waste lot of time ;)

If you want to thank me for all my time I put in this app, you can give me a good review, it helps me a lot, thanks!

HOW TO MIX

What you got is a traditional DJ setup : 2 turntables and a mixer. Your mission is to play simultaneously two songs on each turntable and to use the mixer to mix them together.
